extension.name: AddToAny Share Buttons
extension.author: AddToAny
extension.description: Configurable share buttons automatically placed to share your content. Buttons include AddToAny's universal share button, Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, WhatsApp and many more.

field.name: icon_size
field.label: Icon Size
field.description: Specify the icon size in pixels.

field.name: service_buttons_html_code
field.label: Service Buttons HTML Code
field.description: HTML code to display customizable standalone service buttons next to each universal sharing button.

field.name: service_buttons_html_code_note
universal_button_position
field.description: Place AddToAny's Universal Share Button before or after service buttons.
field.label: Universal Button Position

field.name: universal_button_innerhtml
field.label: Universal Button Inner HTML
field.description: Specify the Universal Share Button's inner HTML code, such as a share button image.

field.name: universal_button_innerhtml_note
field.label:
For Universal Button Inner HTML, you can specify HTML code for a custom universal button image. For example:
<img src="//static.addtoany.com/buttons/share_save_256_24.png" alt="Share" width="256" height="24">

field.name: additional_js_note
field.label: You can add special JavaScript code to customize AddToAny. Explore AddToAny's documentation here.

field.name: content_position
field.description: When placed in content, where in the content should AddToAny be displayed?
field.label: Display in Content at

field.name: front_page
field.description: Display AddToAny in content on the front page?
field.label: Display on Front Page

field.name: featured_page
field.description: Display AddToAny in content on featured pages?
field.label: Display on Featured Pages

field.name: category_pages
field.description: Display AddToAny in content on category pages?
field.label: Display on Category Pages

field.name: categories_excluded_2
field.label: Categories Excluded
field.description: Select categories to disable sharing in.

field.name: categories_excluded
field.label: Categories Excluded by ID
field.description: Specify comma-separated IDs of each category to exclude. For example: 2,42,314

field.name: noshare
field.label:
Disabling share buttons on articles

To disable sharing on a specific page, add <!--noshare--> to the source code of your content.
